Name: HaHa Time 哈哈时光
About the game: As the game's name implies, 'Haha Time' is a digital game that makes people relaxed and happy. Multi person online is not supported for the time being, easy controls,this game allows you to reap the excitement and satisfaction of childhood in the process of playing. In order to provide players of all ages, adults or children, a relaxing and enjoyable leisure experience, we designed this game, where adults can accompany their kids to enjoy happy moments. We Wish all friends a happy life! 1. Game regulations The game contains three levels, and players need to collect a specific amount of treasures to pass each level. a gold coin corresponds to 1 point.a note correspond to 1 point to 9 points.A sprite ball corresponds to a high score of 1000 points, only when you touch the back side of the sprite ball can you successfully collect it. Of course, the playground also has robot troublemakers. When detecting you, they will come after you to hit you. Oh, please notice that each hit can reduce the player's 1 point of energy and users’ points. Cumulative hit reaching 30 times, the player will be forced to teleport to any location away from the initial location randomly. In addition, one more robot dedicated to make trouble for the player will be added every 10-20 seconds.The longer the game lasts, the more difficult the game will be. Haha, this game is a bit tricky, right? Well, in general, the game is not particularly difficult. As a casual entertainment game, Ha Ha Time shouldn't be designed to be overly complicated. However, it can still be somewhat tricky to beat the record-breaking high score. If you don't believe me, come and try it! 2. Game tips 1. There are four trees inside the game scene from which gold coins might fall. 2. There are big note signs outside the game scene from which notes can be collected. 3. Don't collect gold coins and notes to reach the pass quantity too early, since collecting more sprite balls may give you a higher score. But we advise you, players, to control the duration of the game, as the longer the games lasts, the more irritating robots and difficulty it brings in for you. to do according to one's abilities! 3. Game operation Press 4 keys, 'W,' 'S,' 'A,' 'D,' to control the character to run back and forth or left and right Temporarily not supported：Press the key, 'T,' to hide or display the chat window Press the left mouse button to adjust the direction and perspective 4. Game settings enter your name and choose a profile photo Temporarily not supported：establish the game room Temporarily not supported：Set number of people Temporarily not supported：search for an established room and join the game directly Choose a character your favor OK! 'Ha-Ha Time' will start immediately!
